CustomProfile.Description: Ge‑Sen Love: Plus Pengo! (Arcade Love) is a compilation of four arcade mini‑games that test different skills. The Action Skills Test challenges your reaction speed across varied tasks; the Shooting Skills Test presents short shooting minigames; CombatZeal is a score‑focused shooter played against the clock; and Pengo! is a competitive maze game where up to eight players slide blocks and trap opponents. This party‑style collection offers a blend of action, shooting and puzzle challenges for groups.
